migrations.description: Updates the default workspace data directory to .nx/workspace-data
migrations.name: 19-2-0-move-graph-cache-directory

migrations.description: Set project name in nx.json explicitly
migrations.name: 19-2-4-set-project-name

migrations.description: Set `useLegacyCache` to true for migrating workspaces
migrations.name: use-legacy-cache

migrations.description: Update ciWebServerCommand to use static serve for the application.
migrations.name: update-19-6-0-update-ci-webserver-for-vite

migrations.description: Update TypeScript ESLint packages to v8.13.0 if they are already on v8
migrations.name: update-typescript-eslint-v8.13.0

migrations.description: Update ESLint flat config to include .cjs, .mjs, .cts, and .mts files in overrides (if needed)
migrations.name: add-file-extensions-to-overrides

migrations.description: Migrate no-extra-semi rules into user config, out of nx extendable configs
migrations.name: update-19-1-0-rename-no-extra-semi

migrations.description: Migrate proxy config files to match new format from webpack-dev-server v5.
migrations.name: update-19-6-3-proxy-config

migrations.description: Ensure Module Federation DTS is turned off by default.
migrations.name: update-19-6-0-turn-module-federation-dts-off

migrations.description: Update the server file for Module Federation SSR port value to be the same as the 'serve' target port value.
migrations.name: update-module-federation-ssr-server-file

migrations.description: Ensure Target Defaults are set correctly for Module Federation.
migrations.name: update-19-6-1-ensure-module-federation-target-defaults

migrations.description: If workspace includes Module Federation projects, ensure the new @nx/module-federation package is installed.
migrations.name: ensure-nx-module-federation-package
